.user-speed-buttons {color: rgb(144, 144, 144)!important; background-color: rgb(40, 40, 40)!important; text-decoration: none!important; border: none!important; height: 20px!important; margin-left: 10px!important;}.user-speed-buttons:hover {color: rgb(40, 40, 40)!important; background-color: rgb(144, 144, 144)!important; text-decoration: none!important; border: none!important; height: 20px!important; margin-left: 10px!important;}
